name: Electro Crystal Core
description: When the character to which this is attached would be defeated: Remove this effect, ensure the character will not be defeated, and heal them to 6 HP.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 6 HP.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character <color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>, and heal them to 6 HP.
